text: The Great Gatsby is a 1949 American drama movie directed by Elliott Nugent and was the second version of the 1925 novel of the same name. It stars Alan Ladd, Betty Field, Macdonald Carey, Shelley Winters, Ruth Hussey, Ed Begley, Henry Hull, Howard Da Silva, Tito Vuolo and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1949 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Elliott Nugent Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: The Great Gatsby (1949 movie)
